analyzed: svargaparva
nārāyaṇam namaskṛtya naram ca eva narottamam

original: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ vyāsaṃ tato jayamudīrayet // Bhmj_18.1 //
analyzed: devīm sarasvatīm vyāsam tatas jayam udīrayet
tatas svarga śriyā juṣṭam bhrājiṣṇu mukuṭa aṅgadam
dadarśa śakra saṃkāśam kuru rājam yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

original: taṃ vīkṣya sānujaṃ tatra jātamanyuḥ śatakratum /
analyzed: tam vīkṣya sa anujam tatra jāta manyuḥ śatakratum
uvāca svasti devebhyaḥ svargāya astu ayam añjaliḥ
yatra duryodhanaḥ pāpaḥ pṛthivī kṣaya kāraṇam
sumeru kūṭa vikaṭe vibhāti parama āsane

original: na tatra mama vāso 'sti vrajāmyeṣa namo 'stu te /
analyzed: na tatra mama vāsaḥ sti vrajāmi eṣa namaḥ stu te

original: yatra me bhrātaraḥ śūrāstatra vāso mamādhunā // Bhmj_18.5 //
analyzed: yatra me bhrātaraḥ śūrāḥ tatra vāsaḥ mama adhunā
iti rājñaḥ bruvāṇasya deva dūtam surāḥ tatas
bhrātṝn prati prayāhi iti prāhuḥ vāyu manojavam
sa deva dūta ādiṣṭena vrajan sapadi vartmanā
dadarśa puruṣān ghorān naraka antara vartinaḥ
keśa śoṇita māṃsa asṛj vasā saṃghāta picchile
praklinna aneka kuṇapa vyākīrṇa kṛmi saṃkule
kāka kaṅka baka ulūka vadanaiḥ abhitas vṛte
śava durgandha nīrandhra saṃghaṭṭa śata saṃkule
karapattra śilā pāka saṃtapta sikatā taṭe
lohi taila vasā kumbha kūṭa śalmali dāruṇe
kṣura kaṇṭaka kīla ugra jvālā stambha vibhīṣaṇe
tapta vaitaraṇī visra pūya pūrita saikate
asipatravana utkṛtta nara nārī kṛta svane
ghora andhakāra gahane tatra śuśrāva dharmajaḥ
pāpinām kvāthyamānānām ākrandam dhṛti dāruṇam
kṣaṇam ekam itas rājan mā nivartasva śītalaiḥ
tvad puṇya vātaiḥ spṛṣṭānām asmākam bādhate tamaḥ
vayam bhīma prabhṛtayaḥ pāṇḍavāḥ bhrātaraḥ tava

original: kṛṣṇā ceyaṃ varārohā mahiṣī vallabhā satī /
analyzed: kṛṣṇā ca iyam varārohā mahiṣī vallabhā satī
śrutvā etat karuṇam rājā vajreṇa iva vidāritaḥ
tatra eva tasthau nirdvandvaḥ nindan durlalitam vidheḥ
saḥ vadat bata devānām avicāra hatā eva dhīḥ
yaiḥ eta dharma niratāḥ kleśe smin samupekṣitāḥ

original: ayaṃ mohaḥ prasādo vā viveko nāyamīdṛśaḥ // Bhmj_18.17 //
analyzed: ayam mohaḥ prasādaḥ vā vivekaḥ na ayam īdṛśaḥ

original: vibudhānāṃ na jānanti ye dharmasya vyatikramam /
analyzed: vibudhānām na jānanti ye dharmasya vyatikramam

original: bhramaḥ svapno 'tha māyeyaṃ kimetaditi cintayan // Bhmj_18.18 //
analyzed: bhramaḥ svapnaḥ tha māyā iyam kim etat iti cintayan
deva dūta na jānāmi kasya idam duḥ viceṣṭate

original: ihaivāhaṃ sthito gaccha na me svargeṇa kāraṇam // Bhmj_18.19 //
analyzed: iha eva aham sthitaḥ gaccha na me svargeṇa kāraṇam

original: pūjyante yatra durvṛttā viśasyante nu sādhavaḥ /
analyzed: pūjyante yatra durvṛttāḥ viśasyante nu sādhavaḥ
iti uktaḥ dharmarājena deva dūtaḥ surādhipam

original: gatvā vyajijñapatsarvaṃ sa ca tūṣṇīṃ samāyayau /
analyzed: gatvā vyajijñapat sarvam sa ca tūṣṇīm samāyayau

original: prāpte surādhipe tatra saha dharmādibhiḥ suraiḥ // Bhmj_18.21 //
analyzed: prāpte surādhipe tatra saha dharma ādibhiḥ suraiḥ
na adṛśyata aśubham kiṃcid vavau puṇyaḥ ca mārutaḥ
tatas bravīt surapatiḥ viṣṇam dharmanandanam
asatyam etat nāyā iyam mayā evā iha pradarśitā
etat ālokanam rājñām avaśyam miśra karmaṇām
asatya leśa saṃsparśāt etat droṇa vadhāt tava
ehi paśya nijān bhrātṝn divyam sva padam āśritān
svarga śriyam ca pāñcālīm putrān ca amara tām gatān
iti ukte devarājena vīta śokī yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
snātvā dharma girā svarga gaṅgā ambhasi nabhaḥ prabhe

original: utsṛjya mānuṣaṃ bhāvaṃ puṇyāṃ surasabhāṃ yayau // Bhmj_18.26 //
analyzed: utsṛjya mānuṣam bhāvam puṇyām sura sabhām yayau
apsaraḥ nṛtta lalitān gāyan gandharva kiṃnarān
tatra sva padam ārūḍhān apaśyat anujān nijān

original: maṇḍale ca raveḥ karṇaṃ svayamindreṇa darśitam /
analyzed: maṇḍale ca raveḥ karṇam svayam indreṇa darśitam
abhibhanyum ca rucira ākāra nirjita manmatham
varcaḥ abhidhānam somasya tam sutam soma maṇḍale
gandharva rājam sākṣāt ca dhṛtarāṣṭram janeśvaram

original: vasuṃ śāntanavaṃ bhīṣmaṃ guruṃ droṇaṃ bṛhaspatim /
analyzed: vasum śāntanavam bhīṣmam gurum droṇam bṛhaspatim
nārāyaṇam ca viśveśam śaṅkha cakra gadā dharam

original: yadaṃśā bhuvi ye jātāstāṃśca dṛṣṭvā tadāśrayān /
analyzed: yad aṃśāḥ bhuvi ye jātāḥ tān ca dṛṣṭvā tad āśrayān
āsasāda sat ānandam vandyam nandana vāsinām
dharmasūnuḥ nidhiḥ dhāmnām hariścandra ucitam padam
atha nahuṣa dilīpa dhundhumāra sagara bhagīratha rāma kārtavīryaiḥ

original: nṛpatibhirabhito 'bhivandyamānaḥ sitacaritaḥ sa rarāja rājacandraḥ // Bhmj_18.32 //
analyzed: nṛpatibhiḥ abhitas bhivandyamānaḥ sita caritaḥ sa rarāja rāja candraḥ
śrutvā iti bhārata kathām vaiśampāyana kīrtitām
saṃpanna sarpa satraḥ bhūt nirvṛttaḥ janamejayaḥ
etat sūtena kathitam naimiṣa araṇya vāsinaḥ
niśamya śaunaka mukhāḥ tasthuḥ ānanda nirbharāḥ
iti śrī kṣemendra viracitāyām bhāratamañjaryām svargaparva
